resources.string:
Xchange for WhatsApp allows you to easily exchange or transfer WhatsApp contacts (including contact photo) to any other Bluetooth enabled phone or tablet.
With this app’s easy to use interface transferring your contacts to a different phone or tablet is as simple as selecting your contacts, clicking on device name and pressing the ‘Send’ button. The other device should also be running this app and have the Bluetooth screen open.\n\n
Try it out today !
